coded_answer.p: I'm very pleasepleased to recivedreceived receive thesethis prize. Thank you very much.

The only time I can travel to the U.S.A is in July, because that is the only time I can leave my work. Other workerworkers are taking on other monthmonths so there is only July that is availibleavailable for me.

About the accommodation at Camp California, I would like to stay in a tentstent. I'm a very out dooroutdoor person, who likelikes to go camping and hiking, so staying in a tentstent is like a second home to me.

The two activities that I couldwould like to do are Tennis and Climbing. I'm very good at tennis, and I was a profeshionalprofessional tennis player. I won the U.S. Open and the French open in 1986 and 1988. UnforgivlyUnforgivably, my climbing skill is no wherenowherenothing like my tennis skill, but I alwayalways love climbing. I'm afradeafraid of hightsheights and eversinceever since I alwayalways wanthave always wanted to conqureconquer that fear!

At this point, I would like to know which air lineairline I will be travelingtravelling inon and if it is possible can you send me more information about the Camp California. Also I would like to know how long I will be staying at this camp so I can preparedecide how much money I'm going to need and how many clothes I'm going to take.
I would like to thank you again for the prize that you givehave given me.

Filming about life at school meanmeans filming the studentsstudents' actsactions and behavearebehaviour. We need to show what studentsstudents' interests inare and which subjectsubjects they are interested in.

I think Science areis one of the interesting subjectsubjects in school. It is very interesting and fun with the experementexperiment. Also drama is one of the most fun and interestinteresting subjectsubjects. We can see students expressing their feelingfeelings, wonderful and excittingexciting story that the student made up or from a willwell knowknownwell-known story.

Another excittingexciting subject which most of the students likeslike very much is P.E. Many students like to play sports. (I'm one of them). It would be a good idea to have that in. Plus you can use me as athe main person because I'm very good at it.

We can also film life after school. After school activities isare one of the main thingthings in school.
